meanings.definition: A male sex hormone, such as testosterone.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that an androgen is a hormone that helps boys grow into men.
meanings.sent2: Testosterone is an example of an androgen that plays a role in male development.
meanings.sent3: When the androgen hormone threw a party, all the other hormones showed up wearing mustaches.
meanings.sent4: His androgen levels were like a powerful engine driving his physical changes during puberty.
meanings.sent5: The androgen hormone was like a superhero, transforming boys into men with its special powers.

meanings.definition: Any substance that promotes masculine characteristics.
meanings.sent1: Some foods contain natural androgens that can enhance male traits.
meanings.sent2: Bodybuilders sometimes use supplements that act as androgens to build muscle mass.
meanings.sent3: The androgen supplement flexed its muscles, showing off its 'masculine' effects.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cosmetics, the androgen of confidence can make anyone feel more masculine.
meanings.sent5: The androgen substance worked like a magic potion, boosting masculinity in those who used it.
